document_data.name: Urit
document_data.mainbody: A '''''urit''''' was a [[specialty priest]] of [[Ulutiu]] who served as the leader of their village.
document_data.History: ''Urits'' could be male or female. In addition to their role as their village's religious leader, the ''urit'' was the absolute ruler of their village whose word was law. The ''urit'' was served by a trio of religious lieutenants called ''[[yaaurit]]s''.
